name: Dice Wars
description:
Created for GMTK 2022 "Roll of the Dice"

Physics-based dice vs. dice combat game.  Depending on the side of the dice you land on, the more power you can use to blast your opponent off the platform and win!

Pinnacle of "oh crap GMTK is happening but I'm sorta busy so I can tell myself I have an excuse for slacking off."

Requires 2 players.

Made in Godot Engine.

Softmedia Techware 1996.
